mhsjava
Class MineField

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JLabel
                  mhsjava.MineField
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.SwingConstants
public class MineField
extends javax.swing.JLabel
implements java.awt.event.MouseListener

Contains the actual array of game Squares. - handles the event code for the mouse actions to set flags, reveal mines, etc

Version:
1.7 - 2006/010/26
Author:
Mark Sattolo (based on code by Mats Antell)
See Also:
Serialized Form

          The data structure behind every square in the minefield.

clearOut

protected void clearOut(int u,
                        int v)
Find and reveal all adjacent blank space and bordering numbered Squares. - gets called recursively for blank Squares (i.e. those NOT adjacent to any mines)
